ext_weather.name: Today
ext_weather.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 1pm and 4pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 87. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
